page.title: 16LANGUAGE
page.content: Within our block the majority of people are {bi-lingual.}The languages spoken are {English}and {Welsh.} There are two villages within our block and both these villages have their names taken from welsh descriptive words. One of these villages is { {Brynamman }formerly known as {Gwter {Fawr. }Brynamman translated means the "hill near the Amman (local river)" whereas Gwter Fawr translates to "the large gutter". The other village { {Glanamman }translates to "the banks of the river Amman". Of the two schools within the block one is a Welsh medium school and the other is a bi-lingual school. The welsh language is kept alive in the community by various cultural and leisure groups.
